job_tasks.phrase: een onderzoek uitvoeren naar de mogelijkheden van ChatGPT om de bedrijfsprocessen van Lab21 verder te automatiseren
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a need to understand business processes and explore how a specific technology (ChatGPT) can be used for automation, aligning with business goals.

job_tasks.phrase: de behoeften van de organisatie in kaart te brengen
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to understanding organizational needs, which is a core aspect of business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: de marktpositie van Lab21 te versterken, zowel op het gebied van processen, commercie en marketing
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the strategic business goal of strengthening market position through automation, requiring an understanding of business operations, commerce, and marketing.

job_tasks.phrase: het implementeren en beheren van AI-oplossingen binnen ons bedrijf
job_tasks.justification: Implementing and managing solutions implies development and integration into existing systems, which falls under software development.
Suggesting technological solutions implies designing and potentially building them, aligning with software development.

job_tasks.phrase: analyseren en optimaliseren van bestaande systemen en processen
job_tasks.justification: Analyzing and optimizing existing systems and processes is a form of software development/engineering, focused on improving functionality and efficiency.

job_tasks.phrase: identificeert kansen om AI-technologieën toe te passen
job_tasks.justification: While broad, identifying opportunities to apply AI technologies often involves understanding how to adapt or utilize models for specific tasks, hinting at modeling activities.

soft_skills.phrase: Je werkt nauw samen met verschillende teams
Je zult rechtstreeks rapporteren aan de directie
een strategische rol vervullen bij het bespreken van automatiseringsvraagstukken
Deze functie is nieuw binnen Lab21, wat betekent dat je een grote invloed hebt op de invulling ervan
analyseren en optimaliseren van bestaande systemen en processen

classification.rationale: The role focuses heavily on understanding business needs and applying existing AI tools like ChatGPT to automate processes. It lacks deep dives into algorithm development, fine-tuning specific models, or building complex AI systems from scratch, which are hallmarks of GenAI or ML Engineer roles. The emphasis is more on integration and business impact rather than core AI development.
